EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
Looks like we have done some business together in the past, although not recently. The purpose of my email is to re-introduce you to ACV and schedule some time for us to share all the exciting services we can provide at a competitive level to save you money and keep you in compliance.
ACV Enviro is a fully integrated environmental services and waste management organization with offices throughout the Northeast and Midwest. We own and operate permitted part B treatment, disposal, and recycling facilities; supported by an extensive line of remediation, transportation, industrial cleaning, waste disposal/recycling, emergency response and field services. Our combined locations enhance our ability to respond to your needs 24/7, and deliver great, safe service, which you should expect.
Please let me know a day and time that works best for you. Check out our website www.acvenviro.com
